CustomField.description: Enables the slack message sent to the public group configured for the CRP Team for any requests where the Opportunity amount meets or exceeds the Managed Request Opportunity Threshold.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enables the slack message sent to the public group configured for the CRP Team for any requests where the Opportunity amount meets or exceeds the Managed Request Opportunity Threshold.
CustomField.label: Large Oppty Reference Request Slack
